passive.name: ECHOING FLAMES
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) ECHOING FLAMES
                                Urgot's attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts from his leg cannons, dealing 29 (50/65/80/95% ) + 3/4/5/6% (increase at level 1/5/9/13) of the target's max health as physical damage. (15/8/4/2s () cooldown per leg).Deals 100 () max damage against monsters.

q.name: (Q) CORROSIVE CHARGE
q.description:
(Q) CORROSIVE CHARGE
 9.5/9/8.5/8s   70 
                                
                                
                                Fires an explosive charge that deals 110 physical damage (25/85/145/205 + 70% ) and slows by 45/50/55/60% for 1.25 seconds.

w.name: (W) PURGE
w.description:
(W) PURGE
 12/8/4/0.5s   30/20/10/0 
                                
                                
                                Shoots the nearest enemy rapidly for 4 seconds, dealing 18 physical damage (6 + 20/25/30/35% ) and applying on-hits at 70% effectiveness. During this time Urgot's Movement Speed is reduced by 125/110/95/80 and he gains 40% Slow Resist.Dealing a minimum of 50 damage to minions and monsters, prioritizes the champion hit most recently by Urgot's abilities. At max rank, Purge gains infinite duration.Re-cast: Ends Purge.

e.name: (E) DISDAIN
e.description:
(E) DISDAIN
 14/13/12/11s   60/70/80/90 
                                
                                
                                Gain a shield that absorbs 70 damage (70/100/130/160 + 150%  + 15% bonus ) for 4 seconds and charges forward, dealing 90 physical damage (90/130/170/210 + 100% bonus ) and stunning them for 1.5 seconds. Flings the first enemy champion over him and knock non-champions aside.

r.name: (R) FEAR BEYOND DEATH
r.description:
(R) FEAR BEYOND DEATH
 60/55/50s  
                                
                                
                                Fires a chem-drill that deals 100 physical damage (100/225/350 +Â 70% bonus ) to the fist champion hit and impales them for 4 seconds, slowing them by up to 75% based on their missing health.Re-cast: If the impaled target falls below 25% Health, Urgot channels for 1.5 seconds while he reels in and executes them. Upon an execution, nearby enemies are feared for 1.5 seconds.Fear Beyond Death is automatically re-cast if the enemy is below the threshold at the end of the duration.

boots_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

boots_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
boots_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

situational_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

situational_items_detailed.passive: Reduces duration of stuns, slows, taunts, fears, silences, blinds, and immobilizes by 30%
situational_items_detailed.description: Magic resistance boots that also provide tenacity, reducing the duration of crowd control effects. Essential against heavy AP or CC compositions.

example_build_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.

keystone_detailed.description: You and your nearby ally gain a shield when either of you would take damage from an enemy champion.

runes_detailed.description: After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal reduced damage.
Gain tenacity for each Legend stack (max 10 stacks). Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, and minion kill.
